skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage and heals him, based on the target's maximum health.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Aatrox slams his greatsword down up to 3 times, with each having an unique area of effect and physical damage dealt. The damage is increased if enemies are hit by a telegraphed Sweetspot within the area.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Aatrox smashes the ground, sending forth a chain that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and tethers a champion or large monster to the ground.

skill_e.tooltip: Passive: Aatrox heals for the portion of the damage he deals to champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining a burst of movement speed.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Ahri generates stacks when she strikes enemies with her abilities. At maximum stacks, her next ability hit also heals her for each enemy hit.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Ahri gains a burst of movement speed and releases three fox-fires that lock onto nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. Fox-Fire prioritizes champions and her main target.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Ahri blows forth a kiss that charms the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage and instantly stopping movement abilities.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Akali's damage with abilities to a champion marks a ring around them for a duration, and she gains movement speed away from them.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Akali throws out a flurry of kunai, dealing magic damage. Targets hit at the maximum range are briefly slowed.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Akali drops a cover of smoke and gains a burst of movement speed. While inside the smoke, Akali becomes invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Akali dashes backward and throws a shuriken forward that deals magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing damage again.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Akali dashes over a target enemy champion, damaging all enemies she strikes with physical damage. Re-cast to dash in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes with magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Alistar charges up his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up into the air.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing magic damage and knocking them back.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, becoming ghosted and dealing magic damage to enemies, gaining stacks for trampling champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Alistar lets out a wild roar, cleansing all crowd control effects from himself and gaining damage reduction for a duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and Curse of the Sad Mummy mark enemies with Curse, causing them to temporarily take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and dealing magic damage to the target while he dashes to them.

skill_w.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu begins crying, causing nearby enemies to take a percentage of their maximum health each second as magic damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Passive: Amumu gains damage reduction against physical damage. Each time he is hit by a basic attack, Tantrum's cooldown is reduced.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Amumu entangles surrounding enemies in bandages, dealing magic damage, stopping their movements, and stunning them.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Anivia brings her wings together and sends forth a sphere of ice, slowing and dealing magic damage to enemies in its path. At the end of its range, the ice explodes, stunning and dealing the same damage to nearby enemies. Re-cast to detonate early.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Anivia erects an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing some magic damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Toggle: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail that deals magic damage to enemies and slows them.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Annie's spell-casts generate stacks. At maximum stacks, her next offensive spell will consume them to stun the target for a short duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at an enemy, dealing magic damage. The mana cost is refunded if it kills the target.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Annie grants herself or an allied champion—and Tibbers—a shield with a burst of movement speed.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Annie summons her bear Tibbers, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area.

skill_i.tooltip:
Innate: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: main weapon and off-hand weapon. Each weapon has a unique basic attack and active ability.

Innate - Precision: Aphelios has bonus range while Calibrum is his main weapon. Abilities will mark targets, and he may attack them from far away with the current off-hand weapon, consuming the mark and dealing bonus physical damage.

Innate - Resurgent: Aphelios' basic attacks will heal him, and create a shield from excess healing.

Innate - Binding: Aphelios's basic attacks apply a decaying slow on-hit.

Innate - Incendiary: Aphelios' basic attacks will hit all enemies in trajectory. The attack will spread into a cone behind his main target.

Innate - Arcing: Aphelios throws a chakram as his basic attack, he cannot attack until it returns to him. Other abilities will create mirror chakrams that he accumulates, and use them to empower his damage.

skill_q.tooltip:
The active effect of Aphelios' varies based on his current main weapon. Calibrum - Moonshot: Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack. Severum - Onslaught: Gain bonus movement speed while attacking a single enemy with both weapons. Gravitum - Binding Eclipse: Root all enemies who are slowed by this weapon. Infernum - Duskwave: Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon. Crescendum - Sentry: Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

Active: Aphelios fires a bolt of energy that collides upon the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage.

Active: Aphelios gains bonus movement speed and quickly attacks a target with Severum and his current off-hand weapon dealing physical damage to them.

Active: Aphelios deals magic damage and roots all targets that are slowed by Gravitum.

Active: Aphelios unleases a wave of energy in a cone, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and locking on to each of them. After a delay he basic attacks all locked targets.

Active: Aphelios deploys lunar sentry that uses his off-hand weapon. It attacks nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Aphelios switches between his main weapon and off-hand weapon.

skill_e.tooltip: The icon of this ability reflects the next weapon that is the next in Aphelios' weapon queue.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing physical damage to enemy champions in the area.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Ashe's basic attacks apply a slow on-hit, causing her subsequent basic attacks to deal increased damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Passive: Ashe gains stacks by basic attacking enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Ashe fires arrows in a cone dealing physical damage and applying Critical Slow to enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Ashe sends out her Hawk Spirit. The spirit exposes the area along its path and a large area at its destination.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Ashe launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage. The stun duration increases the farther the arrow has traveled.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding star, which explodes to stun and deal magic damage to nearby enemies when it reaches the Outer Limit. Re-cast to detonate.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: The stars' base damage is increased.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Stars and takes flight, dashing in the target direction. While flying, he can see and be seen over walls. Re-cast to end early.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure star fire, dealing magic damage and slowing all enemies struck. Close enemies are also knocked back to the Outer Limit.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Azir periodically can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers to dash towards a location. They deal magic damage and slow enemies they pass through.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: If three Sand Soldiers are summoned, Azir gains bonus attack speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Azir shields himself and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, dealing magic damage to enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a charge of Arise! and halts his dash.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Azir summons a wall of soldiers that charges forward, knocking back and dealing magic damage to enemies. They will stand as a wall for a short time afterward.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate - Ancient Chimes: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear. Collecting a chime grants him experience, mana, and burst of movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Bard fires an energy bolt which deals magic damage and slows the first enemy hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Bard conjures a shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing if a champion steps on it. If an ally champion steps on the shrine, they are healed and gain a burst of movement speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Ally and enemy champions alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal, however allies will be faster.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank gets low on health, Mana Barrier generates a shield that scales with maximum mana.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Blitzcrank fires the right hand which deals magic damage and stuns the first enemy hit. The target is also pulled towards Blitzcrank.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive with dramatically increased movement speed and attack speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Blitzcrank charges up a fist to make the next basic attack deal double damage and knock up the target into the air.

skill_r.tooltip: Passive: While Static Field is available, Blitzcrank's basic attacks apply a stack of Static Field, stacking up to a cap. A stack detonates every second, dealing magic damage to the target.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Enemies are marked ablaze when Brand strikes them with his abilities, dealing a percentage of their maximum health in magic damage over time.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: After a short delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemies within.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Brand conjures a powerful blast from his target, dealing magic damage to them and all enemies near them.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage each time it bounces.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and Winter's Bite apply a stack of Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, allied champion basic attacks can also stack Concussive Blows.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit while applying a stack of Concussive Blows.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Braum dashes to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, both of them gain armor and magic resistance for a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Braum sets his shield in a direction for a duration, intercepting any enemy projectiles to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Every few basic attack Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus physical damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's headshot attack range is doubled.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Caitlyn revs up her rifle to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage to all enemies hit. The projectile expands after the first target but also deal less damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Caitlyn peroidically stocks a trap, up to a cap.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Caitlyn fires a heavy net that slows the first target hit and deals magic damage to them. The recoil dashes her back.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Caitlyn targets an enemy champion and takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive physical damage to them at a huge range. The target's allied champions can intercept the bullet for them.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Periodically, Camille's next basic attack against champions grants a shield against their damage type (physical or magical) for a short time.

skill_q.tooltip: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

skill_w.tooltip: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

skill_e.tooltip:
Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

skill_r.tooltip: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

skill_i.tooltip: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

skill_q.tooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

skill_w.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

skill_e.tooltip: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

skill_r.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

skill_q.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

skill_w.tooltip: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

skill_r.tooltip: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

skill_i.tooltip: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

skill_q.tooltip: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

skill_w.tooltip:
Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

Corki hurtles forward a long distance, knocking aside enemies and creating a trail of scorched earth that damages opponents who remain in it.

skill_e.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

skill_r.tooltip: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.

skill_w.tooltip: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

skill_e.tooltip: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

skill_r.tooltip: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.

skill_w.tooltip: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

skill_e.tooltip: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.

skill_r.tooltip: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

skill_q.tooltip: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).

skill_w.tooltip: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

skill_r.tooltip: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

skill_i.tooltip: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

skill_q.tooltip: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

skill_w.tooltip: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

skill_e.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

skill_r.tooltip: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.

skill_i.tooltip: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

skill_w.tooltip: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

skill_e.tooltip: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

skill_r.tooltip: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

skill_q.tooltip:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

skill_w.tooltip:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.

skill_e.tooltip:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.

skill_r.tooltip: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

skill_i.tooltip: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

skill_q.tooltip: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

skill_w.tooltip: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

skill_e.tooltip: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

skill_i.tooltip: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

skill_q.tooltip: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.

skill_w.tooltip: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.

skill_r.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).

skill_i.tooltip: Fiddlestick can summon an effigy of himself which occupies his trinket slot. This can reveal and disable wards and stealthed traps.

skill_q.tooltip: Damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation hits a target with fear, causing the target to flee in fear for a duration

skill_w.tooltip: Fiddlestick drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration

skill_e.tooltip: Fiddlesticks slashes and area with its scythe. All enemies hit are slowed and those hit in the center are silenced.

skill_r.tooltip: Fiddle sticks blinks to the target location dealing damage in a circle around him.

skill_i.tooltip: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

skill_q.tooltip: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

skill_w.tooltip: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

skill_e.tooltip: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

skill_r.tooltip: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Fizz ignores unit collision and takes reduced damage from each tick of damage up to 50%.

skill_q.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

skill_w.tooltip: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.

skill_e.tooltip:
Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

skill_r.tooltip: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

skill_i.tooltip: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.

skill_q.tooltip: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.

skill_w.tooltip: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

skill_r.tooltip: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

skill_q.tooltip: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

skill_w.tooltip: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

skill_e.tooltip: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

skill_r.tooltip: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

main.attribute: Total Magic Damage Withfire At Will
Maximum Mixed Total Damage Withfire At Will And Death'S Daughter

skill_i.tooltip: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

skill_q.tooltip: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

skill_w.tooltip: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

skill_e.tooltip: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.

skill_r.tooltip: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion. Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.

skill_i.tooltip: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

skill_q.tooltip:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

skill_w.tooltip:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

skill_e.tooltip:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

skill_r.tooltip: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

skill_i.tooltip: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 8% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.

skill_w.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

skill_e.tooltip: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

skill_r.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

skill_i.tooltip: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

skill_q.tooltip: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

skill_w.tooltip: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

skill_r.tooltip: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

skill_i.tooltip: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

skill_e.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

skill_r.tooltip: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

skill_i.tooltip: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

skill_q.tooltip: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

skill_w.tooltip: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

skill_e.tooltip: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

skill_r.tooltip: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.

skill_i.tooltip: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

skill_e.tooltip: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

skill_r.tooltip: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Irelia gains a stack of Ionian Fervor for every target hit by her abilities, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for a few seconds. This grants her bonus Attack Speed and Magic Damage on-hit which increases in the number of stacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Irelia dashes forward striking a target and healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown is reset.

skill_w.tooltip: Irelia charges a strike that reduces physical damage taken while charging and deals more damage as it progresses.

skill_e.tooltip: Irelia sens out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned, and Marked.

skill_r.tooltip: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward once a champion has been hit, slowing and dealing magic damage all targets hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

skill_q.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

skill_w.tooltip: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

skill_e.tooltip: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

skill_i.tooltip: Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her. Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

skill_q.tooltip: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

skill_w.tooltip: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.

skill_e.tooltip: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

skill_i.tooltip: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

skill_w.tooltip: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

skill_i.tooltip: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

skill_w.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

skill_w.tooltip:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.

skill_e.tooltip:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

skill_r.tooltip:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time its targets die.

skill_w.tooltip: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.

skill_e.tooltip: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

skill_r.tooltip: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

skill_i.tooltip: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.

skill_w.tooltip: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

skill_e.tooltip: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

skill_r.tooltip: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

skill_i.tooltip: Kai'Sa's basic attacks deal bonus magic depending on the number of Plasma stacks. Plasma can be stacked by her basic attacks, nearby allies' immobilizing effects, or Void Seeker up to 4 stacks. Kai'Sa can consume the 4th stack dealing bonus magic damage. Kai'Sa can also evolve her abilities depending on her stats.

skill_q.tooltip: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets. When upgraded, Icathian Rain shoots more missiles.

skill_w.tooltip: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missle, marking enemies with her passive. When upgraded, Void Seeker applies more passive marks and reduces the cooldown when a champion is hit.

skill_e.tooltip: Kai'Sa increases her movement speed and attack speed. When upgraded, Supercharge grants her brief invisiblity.

skill_r.tooltip: Kai'Sa dashes to a target location to an visible enemy champion affected by Plasma, shielding herself while dashing.

skill_i.tooltip: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

skill_q.tooltip: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

skill_e.tooltip: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. The ally gains the ability to launch toward a location, knocking enemy champions back.

skill_i.tooltip: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

skill_q.tooltip: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

skill_w.tooltip: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

skill_e.tooltip: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a small area, doubled when only one target is struck.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Karthus creates a passable wall. Enemies that touch it are briefly slowed and have their magic resistance reduced.

skill_e.tooltip: Passive: While toggled off, Karthus regains mana whenever he kills a unit.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals magic damage to all enemy champions on the map.

skill_i.tooltip: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

skill_q.tooltip: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

skill_e.tooltip: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

skill_r.tooltip: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

skill_w.tooltip: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

skill_e.tooltip: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

skill_r.tooltip: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

skill_i.tooltip:
As Kayle gains levels, she ascends into a new form, becoming stronger.
Level 1 - Zealous: Basic attacks grant stacks of Zeal, each giving her attack speed. At max stacks, she becomes Exalted and also gains movement speed.
Level 6 - Arisen: Her range increases as she becomes a ranged champion.
Level 11 - Aflame: While Exalted, her basic attack launches a wave of fire.
Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle becomes permanently Exalted, in addition to gaining even more range.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Kayle summons a celestial sword that travels forward and expands upon hitting a target, dealing magic damage, slowing, and reducing the armor and magic resistance of all targets struck.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Kayle heals herself and the target allied champion, and both gain bonus movement speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage on-hit.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Kayle grants herself or an allied champion invulnerability for few seconds, and conjures swords of fire around herself.

skill_i.tooltip: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

skill_q.tooltip: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

skill_e.tooltip: Kayn can walk through terrain.

skill_r.tooltip: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

skill_i.tooltip: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy. The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

skill_w.tooltip: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

skill_e.tooltip: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.

skill_r.tooltip: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

skill_i.tooltip: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

skill_q.tooltip: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

skill_w.tooltip: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

skill_e.tooltip: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

skill_r.tooltip: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.

skill_i.tooltip: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

skill_q.tooltip: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

skill_w.tooltip: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.

skill_e.tooltip: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

skill_i.tooltip: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

skill_q.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

skill_w.tooltip: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

skill_i.tooltip: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

skill_q.tooltip: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

skill_r.tooltip: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

skill_i.tooltip: When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for a short duration. Damaging the marked target with any ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.

skill_w.tooltip: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

skill_e.tooltip: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.

skill_r.tooltip: LeBlanc can recast any of abiliites a second time.

skill_i.tooltip: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.

skill_q.tooltip:
Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

skill_e.tooltip:
Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

skill_i.tooltip: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

skill_w.tooltip: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

skill_e.tooltip: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

skill_r.tooltip: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

skill_i.tooltip: Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust which deals magic damage over a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Passively, Lillia gains stacking movement speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage enemies around her in a circle, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

skill_w.tooltip: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

skill_e.tooltip: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. It will roll indefinitely unless it hits a wall or a target.

skill_r.tooltip: Lillia renders all champions affected by Dream Dust drowsy, slowing them for a few seconds then making them fall asleep afterwards.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is near, an invulnerable and untargetable ice spirit chases nearby visible enemies, slowing and dealing magic damage after a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

skill_e.tooltip: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

skill_r.tooltip: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

skill_q.tooltip: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

skill_w.tooltip: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

skill_r.tooltip: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

skill_i.tooltip: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

skill_w.tooltip: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

skill_e.tooltip: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

skill_r.tooltip: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

skill_q.tooltip: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

skill_w.tooltip: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

skill_r.tooltip: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

skill_q.tooltip: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).

skill_e.tooltip: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

skill_i.tooltip: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

skill_q.tooltip: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

skill_w.tooltip: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

skill_r.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

skill_i.tooltip: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

skill_q.tooltip: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

skill_w.tooltip: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

skill_e.tooltip: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

skill_r.tooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

skill_i.tooltip: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

skill_q.tooltip: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

skill_w.tooltip: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

skill_e.tooltip: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.

skill_r.tooltip: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

skill_i.tooltip: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

skill_q.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

skill_w.tooltip: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

skill_e.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

skill_r.tooltip: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.

skill_i.tooltip: Mordekaiser's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit. Damaging enemy champions grants stacks and on 3 stacks, he deals bonus damage in an area around him for a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

skill_w.tooltip: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes. Activating this ability creates a shield that he can activate again to consume the shield and heal.

skill_e.tooltip: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

skill_r.tooltip: Mordekaiser sends the targeted champion into the Death Realm for a few seconds, stealing some of their stats.

skill_i.tooltip: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.

skill_q.tooltip: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.

skill_w.tooltip: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.

skill_r.tooltip: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.

skill_i.tooltip: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

skill_w.tooltip: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

skill_i.tooltip: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

skill_q.tooltip: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

skill_w.tooltip: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

skill_e.tooltip: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

skill_r.tooltip: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

skill_q.tooltip: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.

skill_w.tooltip: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.

skill_e.tooltip: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

skill_i.tooltip: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

skill_q.tooltip: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

skill_w.tooltip: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate this ability to send a clone in the chosen direction.

skill_e.tooltip: Neeko shoots a tangle, dealing damage and rooting evrything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

skill_r.tooltip: Neeko leaps up and charges a blossom shielding her for a few seconds. Upon landing, she deals magic damage and stuns enemies within her blast radius.

skill_i.tooltip: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

skill_q.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.

As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

skill_w.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target.

As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

skill_e.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration.

As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

skill_r.tooltip: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

skill_q.tooltip: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

skill_e.tooltip: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

skill_i.tooltip: Nunu and Willump and the nearest allied champion gains bonus Attack Speed and bonus Movement Speed. Willump gans bonus physical damage to enemies behind the target.

skill_q.tooltip: Nunu consumes a minion, monster, or enemy champion dealing damage and healing a portion of the damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Willump creates a giant snowball in-front of him, cleanses and becomes immune to slows, and ghosts.Willump rolls the snowball in the direction of the cursor, speeding up and getting bigger over the duration. At the end of the duration, or when re-cast, the snowball will roll away before exploding after a few seconds, dealing magic damage and knocking up any enemies hit. The snowball will also explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, medium-large monster or terrain.The snowball does damage when rolling over minions.

skill_e.tooltip: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies. When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

skill_r.tooltip: Nunu and Willump start channeling for a few seconds, slowing enemies and gaining a shield. At the end of the duration or if the channel is interrupted, enemies takes magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

skill_q.tooltip: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

skill_e.tooltip: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.

skill_i.tooltip: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

skill_q.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

skill_w.tooltip: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

skill_r.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

skill_i.tooltip: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase. Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

skill_q.tooltip: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

skill_w.tooltip: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

skill_e.tooltip: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

skill_i.tooltip: After five basic attacks or ability cast, Pantheon's next basic ability (Q, W, or E) is empowered.

skill_q.tooltip: Tap: Pantheon strikes in a direction, damaging all enemies in a line. Hold: Pantheon throws his spear in a line. Empowered: Enemies take extra damage and are slowed.

skill_w.tooltip: Pantheon leaps to a target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them. Empowered: Pantheon's next basic attack hits three times, each at reduced damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Pantheon sets his shield in a direction, gaining invulnerability to damage from enemies in that direction and dealing damage continuously. The last hit is extra powerful and still activates if E is canceled early. Empowered: Aegis Assault lasts longer.

skill_r.tooltip: Pantheon leaps into the air and then hurtles back toward a target location, damaging enemies as he passes through. Mortal Will activates immediately when he lands.

skill_i.tooltip: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

skill_q.tooltip: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

skill_w.tooltip: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

skill_r.tooltip: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

skill_i.tooltip: Pyke cannot increase his Maximum Health, instead gaining bonus Attack Damage for it. A portion of the damage taken is stored as Grey Health which he can consume to rapidly heal the same amount.
