skill_q.tooltip: Pyke readies his skewer, stabbing before finishing the charge or pulling an enemy towards him, both dealing physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.

skill_e.tooltip: Pyke dashes and leaves behind him a phant that returns to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

skill_r.tooltip: Pyke targets an area with an X and executes enemy champions below a threshold, granting full gold to him and the last assisting ally. If champions are not below the threshold, he deals some physical damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Qiyana's basic attacks and damaging abilities deal bonus physical damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Qiyana swings her weapoon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on the chosen element.

form.attribute: Total Damage To Targets Beyond The First

skill_w.tooltip: Qiyana dashes to a target location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.

skill_e.tooltip: Qiyana dashes to an enemy and damaging them.

skill_r.tooltip: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target directions knocking back enemies and stopping upon hitting terrain. This sends a shockwave around the border of the terrain dealing damage and stunning any targets hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

skill_e.tooltip: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

skill_r.tooltip:
Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.

Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.

skill_i.tooltip: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

skill_q.tooltip: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

skill_w.tooltip: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

skill_e.tooltip: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

skill_i.tooltip: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

skill_q.tooltip: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

skill_w.tooltip: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

skill_e.tooltip: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

skill_r.tooltip: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

skill_i.tooltip: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

skill_q.tooltip:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

skill_w.tooltip:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

skill_r.tooltip: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Rell's basic attacks temporarily steals a portion of her target's Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds, and deal bonus magic damage based on the amount stolen. Rell can siphon resistances from multiple enemies, but subsequent attacks only refresh the duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Rell stabs forward with her lance, breaking any shields and dealing magic damage to all enemies hit (damage decreases after the first target).

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: Rell gains bonus movement speed while mounted and additional resistances while dismounted.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Rell magnetically binds a piece of her armor to a target allied champion, granting them bonus Armor and Magic Resist while nearby.

skill_r.tooltip: Rell erupts in magnetic fury, yanking nearby enemies toward her. She then creates a gravitational field around her, dragging nearby enemies in for a few seconds. The field does not interrupt her enemies' other actions.

skill_i.tooltip: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

skill_q.tooltip: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

skill_w.tooltip: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

skill_e.tooltip:
Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

skill_r.tooltip: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

skill_i.tooltip: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Rengar's next attack stabs his target for bonus damage. If Rengar has full ferocity, he deals increased damage and grants extra Attack Speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

skill_e.tooltip: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.

skill_i.tooltip: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

skill_q.tooltip: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

skill_r.tooltip:
Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

Riven unleashes a powerful ranged attack, which she may do once during Blade of the Exile.

skill_i.tooltip: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

skill_w.tooltip: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

skill_e.tooltip: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

skill_r.tooltip: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload. On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains Movement Speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.

skill_e.tooltip: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

skill_r.tooltip: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

skill_i.tooltip: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by Immobilizing effects knock them up.

skill_q.tooltip: Samira fires a shot, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Samira slashes around her for 1 second, damaging enemies twice for physical damage each and destroying any enemy missiles that enter the area.

skill_e.tooltip: Samira dashes through an enemy or ally, slashing enemies she passes through dealing magic damage and gaining Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her 10 times over 2 seconds, each shot dealing physical damage and applying lifesteal. Each shot can also critically strike.

skill_i.tooltip: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

skill_w.tooltip: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

skill_e.tooltip: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

skill_r.tooltip: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Senna's Relic Cannon is slow to fire, but deals bonus damage. She can power up its range, Attack Damage, and Crit chance over time by absorbing Mist from enemy champions she's attacking or from wraiths that spawn from dead enemies.

skill_q.tooltip: Senna fires a bolt that heals her allies, and damages her foes. Senna can keep attacking to decrease Piercing Darkness’ cooldown.

skill_w.tooltip: Senna commands the Mist onto the first target hit, damaging them and then rooting that target and surrounding enemies after a brief delay.

skill_e.tooltip: Senna dissolves into a cloud of mist, gaining movement speed and camouflaging her and her nearby allies. Teammates who emerge from the mist appear as unclickable wraiths to enemies until they either attack or get close.

skill_r.tooltip: Senna fires a global beam. Allies in the beam are shielded and enemies caught in the center of it take damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

skill_q.tooltip: Seraphine projects a pure note, dealing magic damage in an area, increased by the target's missing health percentage.

skill_w.tooltip: Seraphine shields and hastes nearby allies. If she is already shielded she will heal nearby allies as well.

skill_e.tooltip: Seraphine unleashes a heavy soundwave, dealing magic damage to enemies in a line and slowing them.

skill_r.tooltip: Seraphine projects a captivating force deals magic damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Sett alternates between a Left Punch and a Right Punch when attacking. His Right PUnch gains bonus range, attacks faster, and deals bonus physical damage. Sett also regenerates health depending on his missing health.

skill_q.tooltip: Sett's next two auto attacks deal additional damage based off the target's max health. Sett also gains movement speed while moving towards enemy champions.

skill_w.tooltip: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. When cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

skill_e.tooltip: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sites of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

skill_r.tooltip: Setts dashes, becoming unstoppable, suppressing and slamming a target champion into the ground. Enemies within the impact area take physical damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

skill_q.tooltip: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

skill_w.tooltip: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.

skill_r.tooltip: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

skill_q.tooltip: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

skill_w.tooltip: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

skill_e.tooltip: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

skill_r.tooltip: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

skill_i.tooltip: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

skill_q.tooltip: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

skill_w.tooltip: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

skill_e.tooltip: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

skill_i.tooltip: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

skill_q.tooltip: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

skill_w.tooltip: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

skill_e.tooltip: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

skill_r.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

skill_i.tooltip:
Innate: Upon death, Sion reanimates with his health decaying increasingly fast. His basic attacks become very rapid, gain 100% lifesteal and deal 10% enemy maximum health as physical damage on-hit, capped against monsters. His abilities are replaced by Death Surge, which grants a burst of movement speed.

Active: Sion's Glory in Death gains a short burst of decaying movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal physical damage to enemies when released. If channeled for at least 1 second, enemies will also be knocked up and stunned.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: Sion gains bonus health whenever he kills a unit.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Sion fires a short range shockwave that deals magic damage, slows and reduces the armor of the first enemy struck. If this enemy is a minion or monster, it will be knocked back further, dealing the effect to all enemies that it passes through.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Sion charges in a direction, becoming Cc-immune and ramping up speed over time. He can steer this charge slightly. When he collides with an enemy champion or terrain, or ends the charge otherwise, he slams the ground to deal physical damage in an area and knock up enemies directly hit. Damage and CC duration increase with the channel time.

skill_i.tooltip: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

skill_w.tooltip: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.

skill_e.tooltip: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

skill_r.tooltip: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

skill_i.tooltip: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

skill_q.tooltip: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

skill_e.tooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

skill_r.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

skill_i.tooltip: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

skill_q.tooltip: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

skill_e.tooltip: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

skill_r.tooltip: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

skill_i.tooltip: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

skill_q.tooltip: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.

skill_w.tooltip: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

skill_e.tooltip: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

skill_r.tooltip: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

skill_i.tooltip: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

skill_q.tooltip: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies hit and stop on impact with enemy champions. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

skill_w.tooltip: Swain summons an eye at the target location, revealing an area and dealing magic damage and slowing enemies after a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

skill_r.tooltip: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to deal damage equal to the amount of health he drained, ending his transformation to decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.

skill_i.tooltip: Sylas stacks of Unshackled for every every ability cast. He gains bonus Attack Speed and his next basic attack deals damage around him, consuming a stack of Unshackled.

skill_q.tooltip: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damaging and slowing enemies hit. After a short delay, the targeted location's intersection point explodes dealing extra damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Sylas lunges at an enemy dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

skill_e.tooltip: Sylas dashes to a location. When recast, he throws his chains out, pulling himself to any enemy he htis and knocks them up for short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Sylas steals any target ultimate. Sylas can only steal ultimates that have not been stolen before for a few seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

skill_q.tooltip: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

skill_w.tooltip: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

skill_r.tooltip: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

skill_i.tooltip: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

skill_w.tooltip:
Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

skill_e.tooltip: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

skill_r.tooltip: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

skill_i.tooltip: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

skill_q.tooltip: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.

skill_w.tooltip: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.

skill_e.tooltip: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.

skill_r.tooltip: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

skill_i.tooltip: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

skill_q.tooltip: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

skill_w.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

skill_e.tooltip: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

skill_r.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

skill_i.tooltip: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

skill_q.tooltip: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

skill_e.tooltip: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

skill_e.tooltip: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

main.attribute: Total Magic Damage In A Single Hit

skill_r.tooltip: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

skill_i.tooltip: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

skill_w.tooltip: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

skill_e.tooltip: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

skill_r.tooltip: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

skill_i.tooltip: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

skill_q.tooltip: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

skill_w.tooltip: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

skill_e.tooltip: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

skill_r.tooltip: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

skill_i.tooltip: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

skill_q.tooltip: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

skill_e.tooltip: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

skill_r.tooltip: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

skill_i.tooltip: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

skill_q.tooltip: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

skill_w.tooltip: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

skill_e.tooltip: Tryndamere slices toward a target location, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

skill_r.tooltip: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

skill_i.tooltip: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

skill_q.tooltip: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

skill_w.tooltip: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

skill_e.tooltip: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

skill_r.tooltip: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

skill_q.tooltip: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

skill_w.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

skill_e.tooltip: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

skill_r.tooltip: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

skill_i.tooltip: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

skill_q.tooltip: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.

skill_e.tooltip: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.

skill_i.tooltip: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

skill_w.tooltip: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

skill_e.tooltip: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

skill_r.tooltip: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

skill_i.tooltip: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

skill_w.tooltip: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.

skill_e.tooltip: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

skill_r.tooltip: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

skill_i.tooltip: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

skill_q.tooltip: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.

skill_w.tooltip: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

skill_e.tooltip: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

skill_r.tooltip: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.

skill_i.tooltip: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

skill_w.tooltip: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

skill_e.tooltip: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.

skill_r.tooltip: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

skill_i.tooltip: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

skill_e.tooltip: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

skill_r.tooltip: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

skill_i.tooltip: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

skill_w.tooltip: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

skill_r.tooltip: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

skill_i.tooltip: Viego can temporarily possess enemy champions he helps kill, healing for a portion of their maximum health.

skill_q.tooltip: Passive: Viego's basic attacks deal a percent of the target's current health as bonus physical damage. When Viego attacks an enemy he recently hit with an ability, the attack strikes twice. The second strike will deal modified physical damage and heal him.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Viego charges, then dashes forward, hurling a blast of mist that collides with the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage and stunning them. Stun duration and mist range increase with charge time.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist along its path and around the first instance of terrain encountered. While in the mist, Viego gains camouflaged, attack speed and movement speed.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Viego discards his current possession and blinks to the target location, attacking the enemy champion in range with the lowest percent health and dealing bonus physical damage based on their missing health. Other nearby enemies are dealt physical damage and knocked back.

skill_i.tooltip: Viktor can augment his basic abilities after gaining Hex Fragments. Chaos Storm gets augmented once of all his basic abilities have been augmented.

skill_q.tooltip: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack. Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.

skill_w.tooltip: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned. Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

skill_e.tooltip: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity. Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

skill_q.tooltip: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

skill_w.tooltip: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

skill_e.tooltip: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

skill_r.tooltip: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Volibear gains stacks of Relentless Storm, granting him bonus Attack Speed whenever he damages an enemy with basic attacks or abilities. At max stacks, he does chain lightning damage to the 4 nearest visible targets.

skill_q.tooltip: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, stunning and damaging the first one he attacks.

skill_w.tooltip: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them. Casting this spell again on the same target deals bonus damage and heals Volibear.

skill_e.tooltip: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location dealing damagte and slowing enemies while granting Volibear a shield if he's inside the blast radius.

skill_r.tooltip: Volibear leaps to the target location, granting him immunity to Crowd Control, unit collision, and granting him bonus Health, range, and increased size. If he targets an enemy structure, it renders it unable to attack.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Warwick deals bonus magic damage on-hit. If he is below 50% maximum health, he heals the same amount. If he is below 25%, this healing triples.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing magic damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt. If the ability is held, he is attached to his target, following all of their movements while he dash behind them.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

skill_e.tooltip: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

skill_r.tooltip: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Wukong gains bonus Armor per level and regenerates extra health, growing whenever a champion or monster is hit.

skill_q.tooltip: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies and cast his Crushing Blow if the real one does.

skill_e.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

skill_r.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

skill_i.tooltip: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

skill_q.tooltip: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

skill_w.tooltip: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

skill_e.tooltip: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

skill_i.tooltip: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

skill_q.tooltip: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

skill_e.tooltip: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

skill_r.tooltip: Xerath channels and gains numerous long-range barrages.

skill_i.tooltip: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

skill_q.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

skill_w.tooltip: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

skill_e.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

skill_r.tooltip: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

skill_i.tooltip: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

skill_q.tooltip: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.

skill_w.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.

skill_e.tooltip: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.

skill_r.tooltip: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.

skill_i.tooltip: Yone doubles his total Critical Hit Chance, but only critical strikes deal less daamge. Yone's basic attacks alternate, dealing physical damage with his Steel Sword and magic damage with the other.

skill_q.tooltip: Yone thrusts his sword, damaging all enemies in a line. When a target is hit, Mortal Steel grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward knocking enemies Airborne.

skill_w.tooltip: Yone cleaves an area in front of him, damaging all enemies in a cone. This grants Yone a shield which icnreases on the number of champions hit. The cooldown and cast time scale with Attack Speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining movement speed. When the duration ends or when recast, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage his spirit dealt.

skill_r.tooltip: Yone marks a line in the target directions, stunning targets and blinking in the direction. Any enemies hit are dealt both physical and magical damage, pulling them in and knocked them up.

skill_i.tooltip: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.

skill_q.tooltip:
Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.

skill_w.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

skill_e.tooltip: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Every so often, Yuumi's next attack against an opponent restores mana and generates a shield. If Yuumi is Attached, the shield protects her ally. The shield protects Yuumi or her ally until it's broken.

skill_q.tooltip: Yuumi fires a missle dealing damage to the first target hit. While attached, the missile can be controlled by your cursor. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively, Yuumi increases her ally's Adaptive Force and her own. Actively, Yuumi dashes and attaches to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets.

skill_e.tooltip: Yuumi heals herself and boosts her Movement Speed and Attack Speed. While attached, shes heals her attached ally.

skill_r.tooltip: Yuumi launches waves in the target directions, dealing magic damage, reduced by subsequent waves, to enemy champions. When struck by three waves, they are rooted, occuring once per target.

skill_i.tooltip: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

skill_q.tooltip: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

skill_w.tooltip: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

skill_r.tooltip: Passively, Zac's blobs grant extra healing. Actively, Zac bounces, gaining bonus Movement Speed, dealing magic damage and knocking them back and slowing them for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

skill_q.tooltip: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.

skill_w.tooltip: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.

skill_e.tooltip: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.

skill_r.tooltip: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

skill_e.tooltip: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.

skill_r.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

skill_i.tooltip: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

skill_q.tooltip: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

skill_e.tooltip: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.

skill_r.tooltip: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight, which deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

skill_w.tooltip: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

skill_e.tooltip: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

skill_r.tooltip: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

skill_i.tooltip: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

skill_w.tooltip: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Additionally, Rampant Growth passively grants her plants improved maximum Health.

skill_e.tooltip: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

skill_r.tooltip: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
